page.title: 12LONGSTONE PARK
page.content: Longstone park is situated between Murrayburn Road, Dumbryden Road and Longstone Road. The E.E.C.(European Economic Community) are giving money to make improvements in the park. Already this has provided new swings, climbing bars and lots of other things e.g. seats for people to sit on. Most people who visit the park do live near it, and are aged between twenty-one and forty years old. Housewives visit the park to take their children for a walk. Most people we spoke to came daily and just walked, enjoying the open space but disliking the long grass most of all. One person started coming in 1969. Everyone was in favour of the improvements and would like climbing bars,more trees, tennis courts, lights sand pits, an enclosed area for children,a roundabout and short grass.
